output-exprs.el:
incidentRecords:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: pv!mailPollerRecords, expression: #"urn:appian:record-type:v1:bea012f4-548e-4f6e-8c53-3050e62ac1d4"( #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:bea012f4-548e-4f6e-8c53-3050e62ac1d4/cc4d789f-8e87-4fef-9a28-f6799f3c544f": concat("INC00000", (ac!incidentNum + fv!index)), #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:bea012f4-548e-4f6e-8c53-3050e62ac1d4/7b1afbf9-b573-4304-bda7-0f1e052cbfee": "Mail Poller Record Created", #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:bea012f4-548e-4f6e-8c53-3050e62ac1d4/60ff3deb-c5f6-4295-a0ca-99984933ee51": index( fv!item, #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:0cc93996-349f-466d-8580-1881c7808655/d80f74c5-6d8f-412a-a336-9baa2a7a7c6b", "" ), #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:bea012f4-548e-4f6e-8c53-3050e62ac1d4/64dcb976-011f-4287-857d-658e638f6c5c": striphtml( index( fv!item, #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:0cc93996-349f-466d-8580-1881c7808655/fbabb2a8-07c1-4d63-a27a-e1e514be79ef", {} ),
), #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:bea012f4-548e-4f6e-8c53-3050e62ac1d4/cabdc530-0164-4608-863a-710a8c03c749": index( fv!item, #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:0cc93996-349f-466d-8580-1881c7808655/96857b31-fe1a-4f1e-8980-3fd254af1827", "" ), #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:bea012f4-548e-4f6e-8c53-3050e62ac1d4/fd962bd5-5f97-44de-9a4e-7a5a0c1e0840": index( fv!item, #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:0cc93996-349f-466d-8580-1881c7808655/c4b4dc8a-1ba3-4dd1-a90d-e1301a165dcb", "" ), #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:bea012f4-548e-4f6e-8c53-3050e62ac1d4/2a89a2a2-5c00-43de-b5fb-1e9066e1cbbc": "Request Created", #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:bea012f4-548e-4f6e-8c53-3050e62ac1d4/bdd91c43-5b4e-4370-9f1e-f9d2c6488958": index( fv!item, #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:0cc93996-349f-466d-8580-1881c7808655/76fea51e-645a-43c3-a587-e4373fd4b2e5", "" ), #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:bea012f4-548e-4f6e-8c53-3050e62ac1d4/91365886-8cc6-4858-aa8b-5fab6a717d18": index( fv!item, #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:0cc93996-349f-466d-8580-1881c7808655/96857b31-fe1a-4f1e-8980-3fd254af1827", "" ) ) )
